text: Ani jaminita aneka prakarace tukade ekamekansi milate julate aheta, ani draksancya baga aheta ani sete aheta ani phandya asaleli khajurici jhade aheta ani kahi ase aheta jyanna phandya nahita. Sarvanna ekaca prakarace pani dile jate, tarihi amhi ekavara ekala phalammadhye sresthata pradana karato. Yata bud'dhimana lokankarita aneka nisanya aheta
